About Five Guys North Charleston

Welcome to your local Five Guys at 7250 Rivers Ave in North Charleston. With more than 250,000 ways to customize your burger and more than 1,000 milkshake combinations, your perfect meal is just a click away! Whether it’s using fresh ground beef (there are no freezers in our restaurants), double-cooking our fries in 100 percent peanut oil, hand-preparing fresh ingredients every morning or serving peanuts while you wait, we strive to provide the best experience each and every time you visit.
View Menu Allergen Info Nutritional Info

FRESH OFF THE GRILL

Frequently Asked Questions
Does Five Guys offer delivery? 
Most North American locations offer delivery. The best way to find out if the location nearest to you offers delivery is to visit our website or download the app.

Additionally, we work with all major third-party delivery companies in the U.S., including DoorDash and Uber, so feel free to search for Five Guys through their platforms!
Does Five Guys menu items contain MSG? 
There is no MSG added to our burgers, hot dogs, fries, seasonings or condiments. The only seasonings offered in our restaurants are salt and Cajun seasoning.
Is the Five Guys veggie sandwich a veggie patty? 
Our veggie sandwich is not a veggie burger, but truthfully, it can be a mix of whatever you'd like. Choose any combination of our condiments and add cheese for an additional cost.

Our standard veggie is a mix of peppers, onions and mushrooms with or without cheese.
What is the best way to reheat leftover fries? 
Leftover fries are excellent reheated in the oven (or Air Fryer). According to Chad Murrell, one of the Five Guys, just pop them in a 350-degree oven for about 10-15 minutes.

Also, give those leftover fries a try as hash browns, home fries, or even as the filling in an omelet.
How many restaurants does Five Guys have? 
We have more than 1,800 locations in over 26 countries! Most of our restaurants are located in North America.

Contact Us

Five Guys Facts

Burger Anatomy 101

Five Guys burgers are hand formed in house and freshly prepared on a flat top grill. Buns are baked fresh with a secret recipe (of real ingredients) and warmed on a dedicated grill for the ideal toast. Choose as many toppings as you want!
Find Out More 
It's Fry-Day

Our boardwalk-style fries are made to order each and every time. Cut fresh each morning by our amazing crew members, these are the same potatoes you see stacked in every one of our locations. Choose between Five Guys Style or Cajun, if you want to add some spice to your meal.
Learn More 
Shake It Up

Five Guys introduced milkshakes in 2014 after years of saying no, and, boy, are we glad we did. With the ability to customize your shake, just like you can customize your burger, we think this is the one for us and hopefully for you! With 11 mix-in options, including Oreo cookie pieces, peanut butter, real strawberries and bacon (!), what will be your go-to combination?
Find Out More $ Burger 
Handcrafted Opportunities for You

At Five Guys, we’re passionate about the food we serve, who we are as a company, and how we work as a team. We also love to have fun (hence the in-store tunes). Ready to join our family?
Join Our Team
